Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Streptomycin Synergy Screen
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Device
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Streptomycin Synergy Screen to determine antimicrobial susceptibility of enterococci and staphylococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, with the addition of Streptomycin Synergy Screen for enterococci.
